description:
Consultant - LBG
----------------

**Agentic Coding Infrastructure**

*   Building agentic coding infrastructure to improve developer productivity by at least 60%
    
*   Designing and implementing autonomous AI agents for enterprise development workflows
    

AI Engineer for GTM
-------------------

**Custom POC Development**

*   Architecting and building agentic AI proof-of-concepts tailored to client requirements
    
*   Delivering custom AI agent solutions addressing specific business needs

- Delivered a **fraud detection and triaging solution** on **Purple Fabric** within **two weeks**
- Solution has already been **demoed to 7 clients**
- Used **agentic AI** to speed up operational processes for **retail banking clients**

- Co-created **ClearFi**, contributing:
  - **50% of frontend** using **Next.js**
  - ~**10% of backend** using **Node.js** and **GraphQL**
- Improved **product strategy and planning** for PMs by building a dashboard in **2 days** using **webhooks (JavaScript)** and **Looker Studio**
- Increased **data entry efficiency for BAs by 300%+** by creating an in-house **CMS using Next.js** within **5 weeks**

- Created a **blockchain POC** using **DAML**
- Learned and delivered the solution within **1 month**

- Wrote **23 educational articles** in one month on **PyTorch-related topics**
- Articles published on the **company website**
- Built **deep learning models** using:
  - MNIST
  - FashionMNIST
  - CIFAR datasets
